double discharge_rate_from_c ( double  c,
double  b,

)

Discharge rate

Power system functions.

Batteries have fixed voltages to the capacity in Ah determines energy storage. The voltage is needed to produce watts.

Parameters:

bBattery capacity (Ah)
vBattery voltage (V)
Returns:
